li.p: The natural basenatural base is an irrational number called e, where e\approx2.71828182845
The natural exponential functionnatural exponential function is the function f (x) = e^x. The natural log functionnatural log function is the function g(x) = \ln x = \log_e x.
We use the natural logarithm to solve exponential equations with base e.
